title: Concentric Healing Homeopathy
cleaned_text: Hi, I'm Kelly A CERTIFIED PROFESSIONAL HOMEOPATH AND LOVER OF NATURAL REMEDIES. Together, we inventory your state of health, allowing me to identify clinically-verified homeopathic remedies that will release stuck patterns, alleviate symptoms, build resilience and restore vitality. Homeopathy changed my life for the better, and I know it can do the same for you. Start Your Healing Journey with Homeopathy Let's Work Together! [HOMEOPATHIC CONSULTATIONS](https://www.concentrichealing.com/homeopathic-consultations/) Overcome your health challenges with customized, 1:1 homeopathic consultations and individualized remedies. [CLINICS & WORKSHOPS](https://www.concentrichealing.com/homeopathy-clinics-and-workshops/) Mark your calendar for any upcoming clinics or workshops and be on your way to learning how to help yourself and your family at home with homeopathy. [WELLNESS RESOURCES](https://www.concentrichealing.com/homeopathic-resources/) Check out an extensive list of educational resources to help you on your path to understanding the benefits of homeopathy. New to Homeopathy and have some questions? Check out the FAQ page to learn more about homeopathy and the process of working with me Is homeopathy a good fit for you? Let's take 15 minutes to talk about it to make sure I'm the right person for you.
